sourcesContent: import Modal from '@mui/material/Modal'; import Grid from '@mui/material/Grid'; import Paper from '@mui/material/Paper'; import Typography from '@mui/material/Typography'; import ButtonBase from '@mui/material/ButtonBase'; import {useTheme} from '@mui/material/styles'; const style = { position: 'absolute', top: '50%', left: '50%', transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)', width: '60vw', bgcolor: 'background.paper', border: '2px solid #000', boxShadow: 24, p: 4, }; var cardStyle = { width: '55vw', transitionDuration: '0.3s', height: '45vw', overflow: 'auto' } const BookDetail = ({handleClose, open, book}) => { const theme = useTheme(); return ( theme.palette.mode === 'dark' ? '#1A2027' : '#fff', }} > Standard license Full resolution 1920x1080 â€¢ JPEG ID: 1030114 Remove $19.00 ) }; export default BookDetail;
